036package org.jfree.chart.internal;
037
038import java.awt.AlphaComposite;
039import java.awt.BasicStroke;
040import java.awt.Color;
041import java.awt.Composite;
042import java.awt.GradientPaint;
043import java.awt.Paint;
044import java.awt.Shape;
045import java.awt.Stroke;
046import java.awt.geom.Arc2D;
047import java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D;
048import java.awt.geom.GeneralPath;
049import java.awt.geom.Line2D;
050import java.awt.geom.PathIterator;
051import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
052import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
053import java.io.IOException;
054import java.io.ObjectInputStream;
055import java.io.ObjectOutputStream;
056import java.io.Serializable;
057import java.text.AttributedCharacterIterator;
058import java.text.AttributedString;
059import java.text.CharacterIterator;
060import java.util.HashMap;
061import java.util.Map;
062
063/**
064 * A class containing useful utility methods relating to serialization.
065 */
066public class SerialUtils {
067
068    /**
069     * Private constructor prevents object creation.
070     */
071    private SerialUtils() {
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * Returns {@code true} if a class implements {@code Serializable}
076     * and {@code false} otherwise.
077     *
078     * @param c  the class.
079     *
080     * @return A boolean.
081     */
082    public static boolean isSerializable(Class c) {
083        return (Serializable.class.isAssignableFrom(c));
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * Reads a {@code Paint} object that has been serialised by the
088     * {@link #writePaint(Paint, ObjectOutputStream)} method.
089     *
090     * @param stream  the input stream ({@code null} not permitted).
091     *
092     * @return The paint object (possibly {@code null}).
093     *
094     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O problem.
095     * @throws ClassNotFoundException  if there is a problem loading a class.
096     */
097    public static Paint readPaint(ObjectInputStream stream)
098             throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {
099        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
100        Paint result = null;
101        boolean isNull = stream.readBoolean();
102        if (!isNull) {
103            final Class c = (Class) stream.readObject();
104            if (isSerializable(c)) {
105                result = (Paint) stream.readObject();
106            } else if (c.equals(GradientPaint.class)) {
107                float x1 = stream.readFloat();
108                float y1 = stream.readFloat();
109                Color c1 = (Color) stream.readObject();
110                float x2 = stream.readFloat();
111                float y2 = stream.readFloat();
112                Color c2 = (Color) stream.readObject();
113                boolean isCyclic = stream.readBoolean();
114                result = new GradientPaint(x1, y1, c1, x2, y2, c2, isCyclic);
115            }
116        }
117        return result;
118    }
119
120    /**
121     * Serialises a {@code Paint} object.
122     *
123     * @param paint  the paint object ({@code null} permitted).
124     * @param stream  the output stream ({@code null} not permitted).
125     *
126     * @throws IOException if there is an I/O error.
127     */
128    public static void writePaint(Paint paint, ObjectOutputStream stream) throws IOException {
129        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
130        if (paint != null) {
131            stream.writeBoolean(false);
132            stream.writeObject(paint.getClass());
133            if (paint instanceof Serializable) {
134                stream.writeObject(paint);
135            } else if (paint instanceof GradientPaint) {
136                final GradientPaint gp = (GradientPaint) paint;
137                stream.writeFloat((float) gp.getPoint1().getX());
138                stream.writeFloat((float) gp.getPoint1().getY());
139                stream.writeObject(gp.getColor1());
140                stream.writeFloat((float) gp.getPoint2().getX());
141                stream.writeFloat((float) gp.getPoint2().getY());
142                stream.writeObject(gp.getColor2());
143                stream.writeBoolean(gp.isCyclic());
144            }
145        } else {
146            stream.writeBoolean(true);
147        }
148    }
149
150    /**
151     * Reads a {@code Stroke} object that has been serialised by the
152     * {@link #writeStroke(Stroke, ObjectOutputStream)} method.
153     *
154     * @param stream  the input stream ({@code null} not permitted).
155     *
156     * @return The stroke object (possibly {@code null}).
157     *
158     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O problem.
159     * @throws ClassNotFoundException  if there is a problem loading a class.
160     */
161    public static Stroke readStroke(ObjectInputStream stream)
162            throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {
163
164        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
165        Stroke result = null;
166        boolean isNull = stream.readBoolean();
167        if (!isNull) {
168            Class c = (Class) stream.readObject();
169            if (c.equals(BasicStroke.class)) {
170                float width = stream.readFloat();
171                int cap = stream.readInt();
172                int join = stream.readInt();
173                float miterLimit = stream.readFloat();
174                float[] dash = (float[]) stream.readObject();
175                float dashPhase = stream.readFloat();
176                result = new BasicStroke(width, cap, join, miterLimit, dash, 
177                        dashPhase);
178            } else {
179                result = (Stroke) stream.readObject();
180            }
181        }
182        return result;
183
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * Serialises a {@code Stroke} object.  This code handles the
188     * {@code BasicStroke} class which is the only {@code Stroke}
189     * implementation provided by the JDK (and isn't directly
190     * {@code Serializable}).
191     *
192     * @param stroke  the stroke object ({@code null} permitted).
193     * @param stream  the output stream ({@code null} not permitted).
194     *
195     * @throws IOException if there is an I/O error.
196     */
197    public static void writeStroke(Stroke stroke, ObjectOutputStream stream)
198            throws IOException {
199
200        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
201        if (stroke != null) {
202            stream.writeBoolean(false);
203            if (stroke instanceof BasicStroke) {
204                BasicStroke s = (BasicStroke) stroke;
205                stream.writeObject(BasicStroke.class);
206                stream.writeFloat(s.getLineWidth());
207                stream.writeInt(s.getEndCap());
208                stream.writeInt(s.getLineJoin());
209                stream.writeFloat(s.getMiterLimit());
210                stream.writeObject(s.getDashArray());
211                stream.writeFloat(s.getDashPhase());
212            } else {
213                stream.writeObject(stroke.getClass());
214                stream.writeObject(stroke);
215            }
216        } else {
217            stream.writeBoolean(true);
218        }
219    }
220
221    /**
222     * Reads a {@code Composite} object that has been serialised by the
223     * {@link #writeComposite(Composite, ObjectOutputStream)}
224     * method.
225     *
226     * @param stream  the input stream ({@code null} not permitted).
227     *
228     * @return The composite object (possibly {@code null}).
229     *
230     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O problem.
231     * @throws ClassNotFoundException  if there is a problem loading a class.
232     */
233    public static Composite readComposite(ObjectInputStream stream)
234            throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {
235
236        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
237        Composite result = null;
238        boolean isNull = stream.readBoolean();
239        if (!isNull) {
240            Class c = (Class) stream.readObject();
241            if (isSerializable(c)) {
242                result = (Composite) stream.readObject();
243            } else if (c.equals(AlphaComposite.class)) {
244                int rule = stream.readInt();
245                float alpha = stream.readFloat();
246                result = AlphaComposite.getInstance(rule, alpha);
247            }
248        }
249        return result;
250
251    }
252
253    /**
254     * Serialises a {@code Composite} object.
255     *
256     * @param composite  the composite object ({@code null} permitted).
257     * @param stream  the output stream ({@code null} not permitted).
258     *
259     * @throws IOException if there is an I/O error.
260     */
261    public static void writeComposite(Composite composite, 
262            ObjectOutputStream stream) throws IOException {
263
264        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
265        if (composite != null) {
266            stream.writeBoolean(false);
267            stream.writeObject(composite.getClass());
268            if (composite instanceof Serializable) {
269                stream.writeObject(composite);
270            }
271            else if (composite instanceof AlphaComposite) {
272                AlphaComposite ac = (AlphaComposite) composite;
273                stream.writeInt(ac.getRule());
274                stream.writeFloat(ac.getAlpha());
275            }
276        } else {
277            stream.writeBoolean(true);
278        }
279    }
280
281    /**
282     * Reads a {@code Shape} object that has been serialised by the
283     * {@link #writeShape(Shape, ObjectOutputStream)} method.
284     *
285     * @param stream  the input stream ({@code null} not permitted).
286     *
287     * @return The shape object (possibly {@code null}).
288     *
289     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O problem.
290     * @throws ClassNotFoundException  if there is a problem loading a class.
291     */
292    public static Shape readShape(ObjectInputStream stream)
293            throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {
294
295        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
296        Shape result = null;
297        boolean isNull = stream.readBoolean();
298        if (!isNull) {
299            Class c = (Class) stream.readObject();
300            if (c.equals(Line2D.class)) {
301                double x1 = stream.readDouble();
302                double y1 = stream.readDouble();
303                double x2 = stream.readDouble();
304                double y2 = stream.readDouble();
305                result = new Line2D.Double(x1, y1, x2, y2);
306            } else if (c.equals(Rectangle2D.class)) {
307                double x = stream.readDouble();
308                double y = stream.readDouble();
309                double w = stream.readDouble();
310                double h = stream.readDouble();
311                result = new Rectangle2D.Double(x, y, w, h);
312            } else if (c.equals(Ellipse2D.class)) {
313                double x = stream.readDouble();
314                double y = stream.readDouble();
315                double w = stream.readDouble();
316                double h = stream.readDouble();
317                result = new Ellipse2D.Double(x, y, w, h);
318            } else if (c.equals(Arc2D.class)) {
319                double x = stream.readDouble();
320                double y = stream.readDouble();
321                double w = stream.readDouble();
322                double h = stream.readDouble();
323                double as = stream.readDouble(); // Angle Start
324                double ae = stream.readDouble(); // Angle Extent
325                int at = stream.readInt();       // Arc type
326                result = new Arc2D.Double(x, y, w, h, as, ae, at);
327            } else if (c.equals(GeneralPath.class)) {
328                GeneralPath gp = new GeneralPath();
329                float[] args = new float[6];
330                boolean hasNext = stream.readBoolean();
331                while (!hasNext) {
332                    int type = stream.readInt();
333                    for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
334                        args[i] = stream.readFloat();
335                    }
336                    switch (type) {
337                        case PathIterator.SEG_MOVETO :
338                            gp.moveTo(args[0], args[1]);
339                            break;
340                        case PathIterator.SEG_LINETO :
341                            gp.lineTo(args[0], args[1]);
342                            break;
343                        case PathIterator.SEG_CUBICTO :
344                            gp.curveTo(args[0], args[1], args[2],
345                                    args[3], args[4], args[5]);
346                            break;
347                        case PathIterator.SEG_QUADTO :
348                            gp.quadTo(args[0], args[1], args[2], args[3]);
349                            break;
350                        case PathIterator.SEG_CLOSE :
351                            gp.closePath();
352                            break;
353                        default :
354                            throw new RuntimeException(
355                                    "JFreeChart - No path exists");
356                    }
357                    gp.setWindingRule(stream.readInt());
358                    hasNext = stream.readBoolean();
359                }
360                result = gp;
361            } else {
362                result = (Shape) stream.readObject();
363            }
364        }
365        return result;
366
367    }
368
369    /**
370     * Serialises a {@code Shape} object.
371     *
372     * @param shape  the shape object ({@code null} permitted).
373     * @param stream  the output stream ({@code null} not permitted).
374     *
375     * @throws IOException if there is an I/O error.
376     */
377    public static void writeShape(Shape shape, ObjectOutputStream stream)
378            throws IOException {
379
380        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
381        if (shape != null) {
382            stream.writeBoolean(false);
383            if (shape instanceof Line2D) {
384                final Line2D line = (Line2D) shape;
385                stream.writeObject(Line2D.class);
386                stream.writeDouble(line.getX1());
387                stream.writeDouble(line.getY1());
388                stream.writeDouble(line.getX2());
389                stream.writeDouble(line.getY2());
390            } else if (shape instanceof Rectangle2D) {
391                final Rectangle2D rectangle = (Rectangle2D) shape;
392                stream.writeObject(Rectangle2D.class);
393                stream.writeDouble(rectangle.getX());
394                stream.writeDouble(rectangle.getY());
395                stream.writeDouble(rectangle.getWidth());
396                stream.writeDouble(rectangle.getHeight());
397            } else if (shape instanceof Ellipse2D) {
398                final Ellipse2D ellipse = (Ellipse2D) shape;
399                stream.writeObject(Ellipse2D.class);
400                stream.writeDouble(ellipse.getX());
401                stream.writeDouble(ellipse.getY());
402                stream.writeDouble(ellipse.getWidth());
403                stream.writeDouble(ellipse.getHeight());
404            } else if (shape instanceof Arc2D) {
405                final Arc2D arc = (Arc2D) shape;
406                stream.writeObject(Arc2D.class);
407                stream.writeDouble(arc.getX());
408                stream.writeDouble(arc.getY());
409                stream.writeDouble(arc.getWidth());
410                stream.writeDouble(arc.getHeight());
411                stream.writeDouble(arc.getAngleStart());
412                stream.writeDouble(arc.getAngleExtent());
413                stream.writeInt(arc.getArcType());
414            } else if (shape instanceof GeneralPath) {
415                stream.writeObject(GeneralPath.class);
416                final PathIterator pi = shape.getPathIterator(null);
417                final float[] args = new float[6];
418                stream.writeBoolean(pi.isDone());
419                while (!pi.isDone()) {
420                    final int type = pi.currentSegment(args);
421                    stream.writeInt(type);
422                    // TODO: could write this to only stream the values
423                    // required for the segment type
424                    for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
425                        stream.writeFloat(args[i]);
426                    }
427                    stream.writeInt(pi.getWindingRule());
428                    pi.next();
429                    stream.writeBoolean(pi.isDone());
430                }
431            } else {
432                stream.writeObject(shape.getClass());
433                stream.writeObject(shape);
434            }
435        } else {
436            stream.writeBoolean(true);
437        }
438    }
439
440    /**
441     * Reads a {@code Point2D} object that has been serialised by the
442     * {@link #writePoint2D(Point2D, ObjectOutputStream)} method.
443     *
444     * @param stream  the input stream ({@code null} not permitted).
445     *
446     * @return The point object (possibly {@code null}).
447     *
448     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O problem.
449     */
450    public static Point2D readPoint2D(ObjectInputStream stream)
451            throws IOException {
452        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
453        Point2D result = null;
454        boolean isNull = stream.readBoolean();
455        if (!isNull) {
456            double x = stream.readDouble();
457            double y = stream.readDouble();
458            result = new Point2D.Double(x, y);
459        }
460        return result;
461    }
462
463    /**
464     * Serialises a {@code Point2D} object.
465     *
466     * @param p  the point object ({@code null} permitted).
467     * @param stream  the output stream ({@code null} not permitted).
468     *
469     * @throws IOException if there is an I/O error.
470     */
471    public static void writePoint2D(Point2D p, ObjectOutputStream stream)
472            throws IOException {
473
474        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
475        if (p != null) {
476            stream.writeBoolean(false);
477            stream.writeDouble(p.getX());
478            stream.writeDouble(p.getY());
479        } else {
480            stream.writeBoolean(true);
481        }
482    }
483
484    /**
485     * Reads a {@code AttributedString} object that has been serialised by
486     * the {@link #writeAttributedString(AttributedString,
487     * ObjectOutputStream)} method.
488     *
489     * @param stream  the input stream ({@code null} not permitted).
490     *
491     * @return The attributed string object (possibly {@code null}).
492     *
493     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O problem.
494     * @throws ClassNotFoundException  if there is a problem loading a class.
495     */
496    public static AttributedString readAttributedString(ObjectInputStream stream)
497            throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {
498
499        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
500        AttributedString result = null;
501        final boolean isNull = stream.readBoolean();
502        if (!isNull) {
503            // read string and attributes then create result
504            String plainStr = (String) stream.readObject();
505            result = new AttributedString(plainStr);
506            char c = stream.readChar();
507            int start = 0;
508            while (c != CharacterIterator.DONE) {
509                int limit = stream.readInt();
510                Map atts = (Map) stream.readObject();
511                result.addAttributes(atts, start, limit);
512                start = limit;
513                c = stream.readChar();
514            }
515        }
516        return result;
517    }
518
519    /**
520     * Serialises an {@code AttributedString} object.
521     *
522     * @param as  the attributed string object ({@code null} permitted).
523     * @param stream  the output stream ({@code null} not permitted).
524     *
525     * @throws IOException if there is an I/O error.
526     */
527    public static void writeAttributedString(AttributedString as,
528            ObjectOutputStream stream) throws IOException {
529
530        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
531        if (as != null) {
532            stream.writeBoolean(false);
533            AttributedCharacterIterator aci = as.getIterator();
534            // build a plain string from aci
535            // then write the string
536            StringBuffer plainStr = new StringBuffer();
537            char current = aci.first();
538            while (current != CharacterIterator.DONE) {
539                plainStr = plainStr.append(current);
540                current = aci.next();
541            }
542            stream.writeObject(plainStr.toString());
543
544            // then write the attributes and limits for each run
545            current = aci.first();
546            int begin = aci.getBeginIndex();
547            while (current != CharacterIterator.DONE) {
548                // write the current character - when the reader sees that this
549                // is not CharacterIterator.DONE, it will know to read the
550                // run limits and attributes
551                stream.writeChar(current);
552
553                // now write the limit, adjusted as if beginIndex is zero
554                int limit = aci.getRunLimit();
555                stream.writeInt(limit - begin);
556
557                // now write the attribute set
558                Map atts = new HashMap(aci.getAttributes());
559                stream.writeObject(atts);
560                current = aci.setIndex(limit);
561            }
562            // write a character that signals to the reader that all runs
563            // are done...
564            stream.writeChar(CharacterIterator.DONE);
565        } else {
566            // write a flag that indicates a null
567            stream.writeBoolean(true);
568        }
569
570    }
571
572    /**
573     * Serialises a {@code Map<Integer, Paint>} instance to the specified stream.
574     * 
575     * @param map  the map ({@code null} permitted).
576     * @param stream  the stream ({@code null} not permitted).
577     * 
578     * @throws IOException if there is an I/O problem.
579     */
580    public static void writeMapOfPaint(Map<Integer, Paint> map, ObjectOutputStream stream) throws IOException {
581        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
582        if (map != null) {
583            stream.writeBoolean(false);
584            int keyCount = map.keySet().size();
585            stream.writeInt(keyCount);
586            for (Integer key : map.keySet()) {
587                Paint p = map.get(key);
588                stream.writeInt(key);
589                writePaint(p, stream);
590            }
591        } else {
592            stream.writeBoolean(true); // indicates null
593        }
594    }
595    
596    /**
597     * Deserialises a {@code Map<Integer, Paint>} instance from the specified stream.
598     * 
599     * @param stream  the stream ({@code null} not permitted).
600     * 
601     * @return A map instance (possibly {@code null}).
602     * 
603     * @throws IOException
604     * @throws ClassNotFoundException 
605     */
606    public static Map<Integer, Paint> readMapOfPaint(ObjectInputStream stream) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {
607        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
608        boolean isNull = stream.readBoolean();
609        if (isNull) {
610            return null;
611        }
612        Map<Integer, Paint> result = new HashMap<>();
613        int keyCount = stream.readInt();
614        for (int i = 0; i < keyCount; i++) {
615            Integer key = stream.readInt();
616            Paint paint = readPaint(stream);
617            result.put(key, paint);
618        }
619        return result;
620    }
621    /**
622     * Serialises a {@code Map<Integer, Stroke>} instance to the specified stream.
623     * 
624     * @param map  the map ({@code null} permitted).
625     * @param stream  the stream ({@code null} not permitted).
626     * 
627     * @throws IOException if there is an I/O problem.
628     */
629    public static void writeMapOfStroke(Map<Integer, Stroke> map, ObjectOutputStream stream) throws IOException {
630        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
631        if (map != null) {
632            stream.writeBoolean(false);
633            int keyCount = map.keySet().size();
634            stream.writeInt(keyCount);
635            for (Integer key : map.keySet()) {
636                Stroke s = map.get(key);
637                stream.writeInt(key);
638                writeStroke(s, stream);
639            }
640        } else {
641            stream.writeBoolean(true); // indicates null
642        }
643    }
644    
645    /**
646     * Deserialises a {@code Map<Integer, Stroke>} instance from the specified stream.
647     * 
648     * @param stream  the stream ({@code null} not permitted).
649     * 
650     * @return A map instance (possibly {@code null}).
651     * 
652     * @throws IOException
653     * @throws ClassNotFoundException 
654     */
655    public static Map<Integer, Stroke> readMapOfStroke(ObjectInputStream stream) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {
656        Args.nullNotPermitted(stream, "stream");
657        boolean isNull = stream.readBoolean();
658        if (isNull) {
659            return null;
660        }
661        Map<Integer, Stroke> result = new HashMap<>();
662        int keyCount = stream.readInt();
663        for (int i = 0; i < keyCount; i++) {
664            Integer key = stream.readInt();
665            Stroke stroke = readStroke(stream);
666            result.put(key, stroke);
667        }
668        return result;
669    }
670
671}
